updates.title: Major Visibility & UX Update
changes: Complete visual overhaul with bright colored monster backgrounds
Pure black background for maximum contrast
Monsters now 2x larger and color-coded (Green=Zombie, Red=Vampire, Cyan=Ghost)
Villagers have pulsing yellow backgrounds - impossible to miss!
Added bright slash trail with custom crosshair cursor
Fixed all gameplay crashes after slicing monsters
Improved memory management and physics system
Enhanced responsive UI for all screen sizes

updates.title: Initial Release
changes: Complete campaign with 25 levels across 5 worlds
6 unique weapons with 3 upgrade tiers each
5 permanent upgrades to boost your power
4 power-ups: Slow Motion, Frenzy, Shield, Soul Magnet
Full progression system with souls currency
3 monster types: Zombies, Vampires, and Ghosts

upcoming.description: Worlds 6-10 with new monsters and bosses
